title: Trov + Twitter -> Trowitter
subtitle: MVVM
description: We are a passionate group of individuals, reinventing insurance for the mobile generation by making it simple, flexible and transparent. Trōv is the world’s first on-demand insurance for your things. With Trōv, you can protect just the things you want, exactly when you want, entirely from your phone. You can also easily organise important information about the things you own and back it up to the cloud, so it’s accessible when needed.
